messages.content: What is the purpose of the Iterative Upscale Factor node in the ComfyUI r44 nodes update?
The Iterative Upscale Factor node is a new feature added in the ComfyUI r44 nodes v1.1.0 update. Its purpose is to compute an upscale factor for a given index in the upscaling chain.
How has the sampling speed been improved in the ComfyUI r44 nodes update v1.1.0?
In the ComfyUI r44 nodes update v1.1.0, the sampling speed has been improved when using large masks with the Runtime44TiledMaskSampler. Areas that are fully covered by the mask are now skipped.
What debug elements were removed in the ComfyUI r44 nodes update v1.1.0?
In the ComfyUI r44 nodes update v1.1.0, debug `print()` usages were removed.
When was the initial release of the ComfyUI r44 nodes?
The initial release of the ComfyUI r44 nodes was on May 1st, 2024, as version 1.0.0.
What improvements were made in the ComfyUI r44 nodes update v1.1.0?

In the ComfyUI r44 nodes update v1.1.0, a new Iterative Upscale Factor node was added, the sampling speed when using large masks with Runtime44TiledMaskSampler was improved, and debug `print()` usages were removed.
Which node was added in the ComfyUI r44 nodes update v1.1.0?
The Iterative Upscale Factor node was added in the ComfyUI r44 nodes update v1.1.0.
When was the ComfyUI r44 nodes update v1.1.0 released?
The ComfyUI r44 nodes update v1.1.0 was released on May 1st, 2024.
What type of license is the GNU Affero General Public License?
The GNU Affero General Public License is a free, copyleft license for software and other kinds of works.
What is the purpose of the GNU Affero General Public License?
The purpose of the GNU Affero General Public License is to ensure cooperation with the community in the case of network server software.
Is the GNU Affero General Public License designed to take away users' freedom to share and change works?
No, the GNU Affero General Public License is intended to guarantee the user's freedom to share and change all versions of a program.
What does it mean when the license refers to free software?
When the license refers to free software, it is referring to freedom, not price.
What are the two steps developers can take to protect users' rights under the GNU Affero General Public License?
Developers can protect users' rights by asserting copyright on the software and offering the GNU Affero General Public License, giving legal permission to copy, distribute and/or modify the software.
What does the Corresponding Source for a work in object code form include?

The Corresponding Source for a work in object code form includes all the source code needed to generate, install, and (for an executable work) run the object code and to modify the work, including scripts to control those activities.
What is the difference between a 'covered work' and a 'modified version' according to the license?

A 'covered work' means either the unmodified Program or a work based on the Program. A 'modified version' of a work refers to copying from or adapting all or part of the work in a fashion requiring copyright permission, other than making an exact copy.
What is Runtime44 ComfyUI Nodes?
Runtime44 ComfyUI Nodes is a collection of custom nodes that extend the functionality of ComfyUI, a GUI that uses stable diffusion models to generate images and videos.
What does the Upscaler node do in Runtime44 ComfyUI Nodes?
The Upscaler node in Runtime44 ComfyUI Nodes allows you to upscale an image in pixel space using an upscale model. You can select the upscale factor as well as the tile size.
How does the Color Match node work in Runtime44 ComfyUI Nodes?
The Color Match node in Runtime44 ComfyUI Nodes matches the color of an image to the color of a reference image.
What is the purpose of the Image Overlay node in Runtime44 ComfyUI Nodes?
The Image Overlay node in Runtime44 ComfyUI Nodes is used to add an image on top of another, which is useful for watermarking.
What does the Image to Noise node do in Runtime44 ComfyUI Nodes?
The Image to Noise node in Runtime44 ComfyUI Nodes converts an image into latent noise.
How can you install Runtime44 ComfyUI Nodes?

To install Runtime44 ComfyUI Nodes, you need to go to your ComfyUI installation root folder, enter the 'custom_nodes' directory, clone the GitHub repository, install the Python dependencies, and restart ComfyUI.
Under what license are Runtime44 ComfyUI Nodes distributed?
Runtime44 ComfyUI Nodes are distributed under the GNU AGPLv3 license.
